name: Lost Empire 2977
description:
Discover your heritage while fighting of an unknown force that hunts you and your kind. To uncover the lost secrets of your past, you must follow the non-linear story-line and gather a team to aid you in your missions.

Lost Empire 2977 is a single-player, action RPG, set in a futuristic sci-fi universe, in the year 2977. It is a top-down game that also allows you to view/play in a 3rd person perspective (though it is not a 3rd person shooter). The gameplay and combat are real-time but you can slow down time to aid your strategic and tactical decisions.

In order to prevail, you must learn to master all aspects of the world.

The game offers a diverse gameplay:
• A unique top-down / 3rd person (hybrid) interface
• Action packed combat, with strategic/tactical aspects
• Crafting equipment, weapons, armor and upgrades
• Gather and manage resources
• Buy/sell equipment, weapons, armor and resources at vendors around the galaxy
• Capture strongholds/bases and conquer planets
• Collect loot throughout the game
• Explore worlds and space stations around the galaxy
